replies.author: 天佑酱
replies.txt_content:
可以设置死亡清空经验吗？
如果可以：
创建一个计分板
/scoreboard objectives add SMFX100 deathCount
当分数为1(玩家死亡)，则清空经验（高频）
execute as @a[scores={SMFX100=1..} run xp @s -10000l
scoreboard players reset @a[scores={SMFX100=1..} SMFX100

如果你是想“掉落”经验，可以追问。

replies.author: 落迁
replies.txt_content:
scoreboard objectuves add level level
scoreboard objectuves add t_exp dummy
scoreboard objectuves add operate dummy
scoreboard objectuves add death deathcount
scoreboard players set dummy_1 operate 6

execute as @a[scores={death=1..}] at @s run summon minecraft:experience_orb ~ ~1 ~ {Tags:["xp_orb"],Value:1}
execute as @a[scores={death=1..,level=0..16}] at @s run scoreboard players operation @s t_exp = @s level
execute as @a[scores={death=1..,level=0..16}] at @s run scoreboard players operation @s t_exp *= @s level
execute as @a[scores={death=1..,level=0..16}] at @s run scoreboard players operation dummy_1 t_exp = @s level
execute as @a[scores={death=1..,level=0..16}] at @s run scoreboard players operation dummy_1 t_exp *= dummy_1 operate
execute as @a[scores={death=1..,level=0..16}] at @s run scoreboard players operation @s t_exp += dummy_1 t_exp
scoreboard players set dummy_1 operate 0
execute store result entity @e[type=minecraft:experience_orb,limit=1,tag=xp_orb] Value double 1 run scoreboard players get @s t_exp
tag @e[type=minecraft:experience_orb,limit=1,tag=xp_orb] remove xp_orb
scoreboard players set @a[scores={death=1..}] death 0


这个仅仅是0-16级的函数。如果需要其他等级的话可以找我。
这个系统还没测过，希望没错吧

replies.author: Ashiel2
replies.txt_content: 或者直接搞死亡掉落，侦测玩家经验值为零（就是死亡的时候经验掉落了）的时候在脚下放一个3*3的漏斗，下面是箱子，然后把箱子里的东西复制到重生点的箱子里，在把原来的漏斗和箱子清空，虽然会出一个大洞但也还是可以了
